reviews.review: 虽然是款老游戏了，但是画面与剧情仍然能让人眼前一亮，战斗方面也很有特色。更重要的是有一个很强的AI队友，能补魔回血收集弹药金币。。
精致的美工，明亮的色调，还有复古的场景设计。。。。好吧我承认这些都是™废话，这个游戏最打动我的地方不是它优秀的美工，也不是它精彩的剧情，而是本篇的女主伊丽莎白。恕我直言，我觉得除了’The lost of us‘里的爱丽和这个游戏的女主伊丽莎白以外，其他在座的友方npc，都™是智障。
Yeah, it's good.

If you like shooters with stories then this one's good, I guess.

EDIT: I actually do really like this game tho.

After finishing this game all the funny reviews start to make sense.

11/10 would flip the coin again
Крутая, атмосферная игра с прекрасными персонажами
Most overrated game on the planet.

Fantastic. This game is even more engrosing than the first one. The world is interesting and epic. The story and lore is absolutley fascinating. The gameplay is crisp and satisfying. Bioshock Infinte had me thinking of the world and plot weeks after I finished it. Do yourself a favour and buy this title!

Also worth mentioning:

I played it on my old garbage PC and it ran incredibly well, the optimaztion is really good. You do not need a good computer to run.
Solo hay una palabra para describirlo y eso obra maestea es un juego imprecionante y la culminacion de una saga extraordinaria, recomendado todos sus juegos.
I'm going to keep this short and just say that everyone should own, play, and complete Bioshock Infinite! It's a masterpiece!

If you like the Half-Life series, you'll love the BioShock series. The BioShock universe is unique, which shows the effort that they put into creating it. There is so much to see and do that sometimes I forgot while I was playing because the graphics are so great! Enjoy it and have fun!

Bioshock Infinite is a really fancy game. It excels at impressing the player with it's setpieces, aesthetic and story. When I first played it, it impressed me immensely too. So much that I gave it a 10/10 and hardly found anything to criticize it for. In retrospect, there are some things to criticize:

The gunplay isn't the worst thing I've ever played by a long shot, however a lot of the enemies really are bullet sponges and sometimes it can feel like your guns lack punch. The vigors have their utility, however they feel less powerful and aren't used as creatively as the plasmids from the original Bioshock. Overall the weapon system feels more janky and not as flexible as in Bioshock, probably due to modern shooter design.

The atmosphere and graphics are stunning and really hold up well most of the time, but when they don't, man does it look bad. Some of the props and effects are extremely low quality if you look at them closely, NPCs look stiff and unvaried, and some of the character models just look uncanny and disproportionate, especially the female characters, which is a shame when your companion throughout the game, Elizabeth, is also affected by this.

However the story and universe are really what's selling Bioshock Infinite, despite their flaws and inconsistencies. Besides Elizabeth's grander personal story, it brings up interesting themes of class struggle, racism, industrialization and more as you help initiate a socialist revolution in Columbia against the patriotic, religious, reactionary and americana-driven state upheld by the Founders. It's a shame that the game's message, similar to Bioshock 1 and 2, seems to be influenced by the horsehoe theory that "both extremes are bad" quite a lot, however that's retconned for the better 2 DLCs later.

At the end of the day, Bioshock Infinite is an interesting experience that's worth playing through at least once and has some minor replayability, even if you just wanna replay it for the story.

8/10 - A cool experience.

Muy bueno la verdad, lo recomiendo mucho en lo que a la historia y jugabilidad se refiere
Me encanto la historia el final me dejo con una especie de masturbacion mental que tarde tiempo en entenderle un poco a la historia c:

pero el juego es buenisimo, pero me hubiera encantado hubiera jefes epicos y el juego hubiera sido excelente (mi opinion personal).

Its a huge change from the previous games. the color scheme and settings are a complete opposite from teh first two bioshocks. The game was beautiful and the story pulled me into it from the start. The characters were developed very well and seemed like they were alive to me. One of the best games I have ever played. My favorite out of the whole series.
第一部让我感到游戏是艺术的作品，天空之城美如画
엘리자베스! 이게임을 사야하는 단 하나의 이유!

Gameplay could be tighter and the story becomes a hastle to chase due to said gameplay, but if you can make it to the end, you'll be rightly rewarded with your heart ripped out and spat on. Enjoyed this treasure of tragedy 8/10
Me enamoré de Elizabeth. ♥
A great immersive story that will make you wonder what to do with your life after you finish, and game play to match.

This entire series is one of the best game series of all time - in my opinion. The story line is amazing. The game play is so much fun. Frightening, thrilling, exciting, enthralling! I can't think of enough words to describe how great this was. At first I was skeptical of Infinite since it doesn't take place in Rapture, but honestly, this is phenomenal. If you enjoyed even just the first Bioshock, you will fall in love with this one. Highly recommend it.
这游戏画面美得不得了，剧情没玩明白。但是伊丽莎白真好啊，战斗中，你缺什么她给你什么。这太逆天了。

Un gran juego, con una historia aunque complicada al pricipio, al final todo tiene sentido, una jugabilidad bastante buena y unos personajes simplemente fantasticos 
Me encanta la forma en la que se te cuenta la historia del juego gracias a tu entorno y grabaciones que encuentras por el camino, 
Lo unico malo que tiene es que no se estimula al jugador a jugarlo mas de una vez, siendo que si haces esto puedes descubrir mucho mas sobre el juego
Vor einem Jahr ist es gekauft worden, jedoch habe ich es immer noch nicht gespielt :(

Fantastic worldbuilding makes exploring Columbia tons of fun. Excellent character development makes uncovering the characters' pasts interesting. An overwhelmingly in depth story makes this game impossible to put down until the very end, and it is well worth the time spent on it.

Se amate il genere "Steampunk" è l'fps perfetto: grandissima atmosfera, completamente localizzato in italiano (anche i dialoghi), bellissima grafica e grandi spunti narrativi. Un must, da prendere al volo in particolare con i saldi :)
Nice game
Très bon jeux

真希望有那么一个世界里布克能自己走出以前阴影，并和安娜幸福地生活下去。
[spoiler]心疼伊丽莎白QAQ[/spoiler]

플레이어에게 확실하게 주어지는 목표가 게임에 더욱 몰입하게 하고 스토리도 정말 심오하다.
전작의 바이오쇼크가 디젤펑크를 완벽하게 묘사했다면 이번에는 눈을 사로잡는 배경, 분위기와 스팀펑크가 잘 묘사되어 있다.
무엇보다 이 게임을 살 이유는 엘리자베스로도 충분하다!

Si eatas leyendo esto para decidirte.... COMPRALO YA ****. 
ahora enserio,  el mejor bioshock en mi opinion. La antigua america, racista, xenofoba,etc.. Es la mejor antagonista. Larga duracion, buen doblaje y bienos graficos por supuesto. Aconsejo encarecidamente comprar en las rebajas el triple pack de todos los bioshocks. No te arrepentirás sin lugar a dudas
Это шедееевр больше и нечего сказать.
各方面都很优秀的作品，时隔多年把游戏打通才知道为什么这么多好评
Игра прекрасная, графа, сюжет все есть, и просто Лиза няшка^^
Non tanto il gameplay, che si presenta tale e quale ai suoi predecessori se non rinnovato sotto alcuni aspetti, ma la storia di questo Bioshock sicuramente vi terrà incollati al monitor

bioshock infinite est pour moi le meilleur des bioshock et ca faisais longtemps que je n'avais plus pris autant de plaisir à finir un jeu.

le design est bien foutu , et ca change de rapture ^^
l'histoire est au petits oignons 
la fin te laisse le cerveaux retourné.

bref si tu aime les jeux avec une belle histoire,un beau design et que tu aime bioshock, ce jeu et fait pour toi.
ps: à quand un nouveaux !!

+最棒的队友
+华丽的哥伦比亚
+炫酷的超能力
+万中无一的剧情

-有些蹩脚的操作
-过于线性的流程

9.8/10

反乌托邦，时空悖论，FPS，漂亮妹子，炫酷超能力。你想要的任何元素都可以在这部作品里找到。因为过长的开发时间而被忽视的佳作，教科书式的叫好不叫座。

说实话很难理解为什么这部作品这么不知名。不管是剧情，角色，场景都是超一流的。只不过因为是几年前的作品所以游戏自由度上有些不尽人意，在满天下沙盒游戏的现在很难stand out。天际线突袭看起来好像让地图变得更大，更自由，实际上只是多了一种战斗手段，并且让晕3D的人更晕了一些。

vigor（游戏中的超能力）明明有多达9种，但能允许快速切换的只有两种，说实话我打了一半才知道能用数字键切换vigor...

整个游戏最大的亮点是伊丽莎白。他是我见过最强大的队友npc，不管你在任何场景停下她都能适时的产生一系列互动，在你战斗的时候不像其他队友还需要保护，伊丽莎白会自己寻找掩体，并且在你需要的时候给你[strike]任何补给[/strike]。弹药，蓝条，金币，要什么有什么。Irretional games在塑造伊丽莎白的表情，动作，配音的时候分别用了三个不同的人，整部作品最精华的部分全部集中在了这一个角色上。你可能会忘记Booker，你可能会忘记Comstock，但你绝对不会忘记那个时不时撕开个时空裂缝，在战火中给你弹药的女孩子：Elizabeth

[h1]게이머로서 꼭 해봐야 할 게임.[/h1]

[b]※스포가 있을수도 있다. 싫으면 꺼졍!![/b]
[b]※병맛과 욕이 포함되었다. 적절히 걸러서 봐라.[/b]
[b]]※반말은 컨셉이다. 걍 닥치고 봐.[/b]
...

바이오쇼크 인피니티.[Bioshock Infinite]

과거,현재,미래를 넘나들며 주인공 부커와 그의 동료인, 엘리자베스와의 이야기를 담고 있다.
알고보면 부커가 개새끼. (스포)

우선 게임 아직 안해봤고 영상조차 접하지 못하고
"우왕 이게임 존나명작이라며! 한번 평가보고 구입할지 말지 생각해보자!"
와 같은 마인드라면 이 평가, 잘 찾아온거다. 사라.

우선 게임자체는 재미는 있지만 지루할 수 있다.
FPS 장르야 이미 예~전부터 차고 넘치던 장르라, 게임 자체에는 지루함을 느낄 수 있다. 이건 레알 팩트임.
하지만 이 게임이 총만쏜다면 어째서 명작이겠는게, 이게 포스탈도 아니고!

우선 스토리 그래픽 이런거 다재치고 게임성만 따지자면
흔한 FPS 방식을 체택함에도 불구하고 다른 FPS 게임들에 비해서 평이 좋다.
왜? 당연히 '활력'이라는 존나 스고이한 능력을 우리가 사용하기 때문이지!

초능력은 모든 인간의 꿈이자 어린이들에겐 선망의 대상이고 한번쯤은 모두 '이랬으면'하고 생각해본거다.
우선 그 초능력이 이 게임에서 나온다. 대리만족을 시켜준다 이거다. 존나 스고이함.
흔한 FPS 게임임에도 우리는 '활력'이라는 요소로 초능력을 체험하고 적군들을 뿌앙뿌앙 터뜨리고 감전시키고 날려버릴 수 있다.
다만 총쏘는게 쉬울거라 생각하고 도전했다가 막상해보니 "어 시발" 하고 어려움을 느끼게 되기도 한다.
그럼뭐어때 초능력 짱짱맨!

자 이제 스토리를 건들여보자.

일단 니들이 스토리를 진행하면서 알게되는것들이 있을거야.
대가리 좀 있으면 추리할 수 있는것도 생길거고 말이야. 막 음성저장기록 이런거 듣고 해석해보면 떡밥이 쩔거든.

자세하게 설명하면 스포고 그냥 스무스하게 너희들의 반응을 알려줄게.

초반 스토리 보면서 너네는
"...? 뭐여 이게." 싶을거임.

중반까지 보면
"저새끼가 개새끼네." 할꺼야.

엔딩보면
"...(현타) 아 시바. 할말을 잃었습니다." 하며 주인공이 싫어질거야.

그냥 보면 존나 감탄할거야. 어느 시점인지 눈치도 못챘는데 떡밥이 서서히 풀려.
심지어 그 풀린 떡밥이 충격적이야. 엔딩보면 더더욱 "아 시바. 할말을 잃었.." 이런 반응일꺼야.

스포당하고 싶은 스포덕후들은 유튜브가서 비제이 영상보거나 나무위키가라.

자 이제 겜덕후인 니들이 겜하면서 가장 중요하게 생각하는 요소중 하나인
'그래픽'을 보자.

주관적으로 보면 난 존나 좋아. 광원효과가 짱짱하면 할맛나거든.
근데 객관적으로 보자면 호불호가 갈리는 그래픽이야.

훌룡한 그래픽인건 맞아. 다만 이 그래픽이 거북한 사람도 있을거야.
밝을땐 지나치게 밝고 어두울땐 지나치게 어두운게 이 게임 그래픽이거든.

아몰랑 그건 니들사정이고 난 좋았어 걍.

좋아 지나치게 긴 평가가 드디어 끝났어.
이제 점수와 함께 해 말어를 평가해보자.

일단 해 말어 평가. 해. 걍 사서 해.

점수는 주관적으로 주겠어. 당연하지만 말이야.
점수는 9.3/10 주겠다.
다 좋았는데 아주 코딱지만하게 이해가 잘 안되는 스토리 부분이 있다.
물론 내 대가리가 딸리는거 맞아. 그래도 어쩌겠어 그 부분이 맘에 안드는데.
그부분만 고치면 난 만점주고싶다. 어렵고 복잡한 스토리를 풀어주는 구간이 있으면 좋겠다.

자 이제 1줄요약! 끝이다!
"그래픽, 스토리, 게임성 삼위일체. 약간 이해가 어려운 스토리가 사알짝 아쉽."


지.나.치.게 긴 평가 다읽어준 사람이 설마 있으려나 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ
만약있으면 고마엉!
One of the best games so far.

I'm going to go ahead and say that this game has one of the most gripping stories I've seen in most games. Now I can't say that I understand it most of the time since english is not my first language and some parts may be a bit hard to understand. But gosh darn did it have me hooked from start to finish.

Trying to find all of the hidden things like audio files and hidden story in form of notes instead of just following the main storyline, that was one of the best parts. In only 2 days I played this game for about 20 hours and I still have some stuff to go through. 

Some of the best DLC I've seen.

Good riddance and thanks for the games irrational games.

可惜对手太强，这次评奖没有获中，如果没有GTA5这支游戏能否获奖呢？说实话我玩游戏很多都是从D版开始，因为之前没有STEAM，很多游戏入手正版太难，本作也是在硬盘上至少停留了2年以上，而且因为1代难度太大，我原来是放弃的，后来一口气又找到1&2重新玩了次，如果不是结尾的销魂城我可能就没有这打算了吧。
必须得说的是DLC更多的是剧情的补完解惑，而游戏性要稍微差一点点，当然这是因为过程太短，并不是真的不好玩。当初传说的3代本来的超高难度外貌，貌似在DLC中可以管中窥豹。
唯一的遗憾是女儿最后还是死了，但是对于她的人生来说，这个结局也许是最好的，因为太累了，需要好好的休息了吧。
有点想再去好好玩玩1代，话说2代确实是外传性质，就主线来说1代和3代还有DLC完美的组成了一个闭环。另外，这个游戏真的非常值得入手一个留做纪念，我也在安利朋友玩，就剧情来说，绝对能达到经典小说级别，我玩了很多RPG游戏，不乏经典，但是本作的剧情是前所未见的，没有能获得这次的STEAM提名奖真是可惜。
女儿，祝你有个好梦。
TOP NOTCH!   Simply ONE OF THE the best games ihave played

Plot: "What is love? Baby don't hurt me. Don't hurt me. No more..."

10/10 Would baptise again

Vamos que se ve del putas! Te corre en un portatil sencillo como cualquiere (tengo uno casero y corre bien), COMPRALO TÍO!

Lo que Mola: Las gráficas incluso en un pc barato, la jugabilidad, la historia que te frie el puto coco! Y jugar en las nubes contra bestias que te parten hasta el alma! Vamos este vale sus horas!

Lo que Aburre: Que sea tan corto como el cerebro de un big daddy...
The story of this game is very interesting and Elizabeth is a great character. I hate the combat system which I find lackluster, but it's probably up to personnal preferences.

This is without a doubt the greatest game I have played to-date. Its blending of story and action make for the perfect RPG game. The characters are interesting and their interactions are perfect. The wide range of guns allows you to be flexible and prepared for whatever comes your way. I also found the challenge factor to increase in difficulty, unlike many other games,  with the level of your equiptment, guns, and Vigor.  If, like me, you've never played a Bioshock title before this; you'll be in for for what I have found to be a hugely worth while game.
Amazing storyline and graphics. Would highly reccomend if you're looking for a fun FPS game with an awesome story.

Este juego le daria un 11/10 es algo personal y opinión mía ....es un juego que me demostró que los videojuegos pueden llegar a ser un arte y antes no pensaba de esa manera y este juego lo hizo,me lo demostro,es uno de mis favoritos y lo respeto mucho, es de los pocos juegos que le dan un gran final a saga. Y sus dlc demostraron la capacidad de culminar una franquicia. Sigue siendo el favorito de la vida

The ending almost brought me to tears, and fucked my brain up big time.

This game truly is mind blowing, in terms of the voice acting, the plot, the scripting, the gameplay, and of course the beautiful graphics.

Us gamers tend to hold up this title as a perfect example of a game done right, after being asked why we waste our time on our PCs. This is an experience of a lifetime, and you can only understand this once you've played it.

Не читайте спойлеров. Всю игру думал почему такие крайне положительные отзывы, несмотря на то, что постоянно было ощущение "да что здесь происходит?", всё запутано и малопонятно. И решится в самом конце. Но вот эта самая концовка - она делает всю игру. Ну и проработка Элизабет это нечто. Это не скриптовый бот, это реально главный персонаж, озвучка, мимика, настроение, движения всё проработано до мелочей.
玩通关后 写点东西；  这是我在上次打折买的  因为很久没玩FPS游戏了  滑天梯的时候 感觉真的很好。 可惜我本人实在没办法热爱FPS游戏 可能我体质问题吧 玩久一点就不想玩了 小时候还会吐 比如当初玩DOOM的时候。  这游戏算是我玩过的FPS里面 rpg成分最多的一个了  确实是好游戏 但也只推荐喜欢FPS的玩家买
Simplismente fantástico, o melhor game que já joguei.

+ Beautiful scenery. Such unique and detail environment. No kidding, I spent lot of times only to enjoy the view.
+ Most helpful AI companion I've ever encountered. I can't imagine progressing the game without Elizabeth. 
+ As always, the unexpected ending. It will definitely confuse you the first time you finished the game. But, it will blow your mind at the time you understand.
+ Same gameplay mechanics as previous series only it smoother + skylines
+ Great character development throughout the game

- (Maybe it's only me) The voice recorder bored me as always (same as previous series), so I pay less attention to listen + there aren't subs CMIIW (I finished the game a month ago sorry). 
- No horror aspect added (it occured only at certain times). Probably this is why it let down some of fans.

9/10
infinite is the word as this game shall be in my heart for infinity.

游戏七成以上的魅力都来自剧情，真的是无语伦比。表面有趣吸引人，深层值得挖掘和思考，细节到位，表里兼顾。
不同于前两作的战斗系统有利有弊吧，枪只能携带两把看上去不够用，实际上大部分武器都是“玩具”，实用度不够。新的特殊能力都有各自的作用比武器系统做得好。“过山车”跑路比较嗨，打架还是菜的。
I still have nightmares of those damn motorized patriots. This is my favorite indie horror game.
冬季特惠购入，几十块钱确实比较值。画面确实不如现在的大作精致，但是剧情十分吸引人，推荐购买
好好讲故事的游戏

Really fun game to play if your looking for a really good story you can get into and it has good combat mechanics which make it fun. Your able to kill the enemies in many different ways which make your play style different from others. Really good story all the way through, thats what kept me playing this game!
It's a blast to play with a story with a shocking twist. (Sorry, not sorry)

一款很棒的游戏，画面上无可挑剔，左手魔法右手开枪就通关了。意犹未尽，通关太快。
战斗略简单，基本没啥难度，就是死了小萝莉也会救回来。不过有小萝莉，一直有血包，基本死不了；还有弹药，这和开无限弹药一样。
画面满分十分，我给十二。精美到惊艳。上世纪风格的射击游戏，拿着王八大盖和汉阳造就是无敌的。lol
不过剧情嘛，嗯，很深刻，深刻的有点看不懂。最后十分钟的剧情信息量太大。编剧真是脑洞大到可以呢。
How did this game not win "Woooooaaaaa Dude" ?
Great game strongly recommended

This is the greatest game on earth. The minute I finished, my mind was completely blown. After I scraped remains off my walls, I put my mind back together, I started a new game, so I could play through again. No other game can compare.
Great game if you like first person shooters and steam punked

Antes de empezar me gustaría decir que es un poco dificil hacer este análisis de forma objetiva, ya que es uno de mis juegos favoritos.

Bioshock Infinite trata la historia de Booker, un hombre que tiene que ir a una ciudad flotante a por una chica para saldar una gran deuda.
Puedes jugar a este sin haber jugado al primero, eso no significa que no te vayas a perder ningun guiño, ni entender algunas cosas.
El juego tiene varios pro y varias contras.

Pros:
-La banda sonora es muy buena, vale la pena pararse a escucharla.
-La ambientación que tiene no le puede gustar a todo el mundo pero desde mi punto de vista me encanta.
-La historia es muy buena, me lo tuve que pasar 2 veces para enterarme bien de la historia pero cuando lo entiendes todo es alucinante.

Contras:
-Como dije antes, la historia puedes no entenderla a la primera.
-Los combates pueden llegar a ser cansinos para alguna gente, para mi personalmente no, ya que me gusta tener variedad, cosa que el juego te da.
-Quizas, Elizabeth a veces se pasa dandote objetos y se puede hacer algo facil.


Eso para mi es todo lo que queria comentar, yo lo recomiendo muchísimo.
De hecho, para mi es una obra de arte.
역시 시대의명작

Trama incredibile e piena di colpi di scena, ambientazione fantastica e personaggi principali mai banali e ben caratterizzati. Pecca in lunghezza in termini di ore di gioco, ma tutte le caratteristiche sopracitate sopperiscono a questa mancanza, perché il gioco prende subito e tiene incollati fino alla fine.
